main event: A witness observed multiple unidentified flying objects in Mountain View, California on 12 September 1964.
interesting points: The first object observed was an orange-red round object with a light trail streaking across the sky for 3 seconds., A yellow light resembling a comet tail was seen for 10 seconds and appeared to be the size of a nickel at arm's length., A round white object with a trail similar to a falling star blinked out in 5 seconds., The total length of the observation was 1 minute and 10 seconds., The report speculated various explanations for the sightings, including balloons, aircraft, and astronomical meteors.
sighted object: orange-red round object, yellow light, round white object
witness description: Pollie R. Brown, located in California
